{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Edimax |model=OAP1300 |revision=Pro (EW-7429HOB) |series=AC1300 |asin=B07JFLBP6G;GB;, |fcc_date=12/27/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=access point |fcc_id=NDD9574291705 |pcb_id=1246-01000209-50Z |pwr_v=54 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn= |pwr_poe=at |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4018 |cpu1_cspeed=710 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L25635FMI-10G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model= |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4018 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=IPQ4018 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8072 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, 802.11r/k, Band Steering, Beamforming, IP56, DFS (master), heatsink, |addl_chips=2.4/5GHz WLAN FEM;Skyworks;SKY<…>;;2; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.2.2 |default_user=admin |default_pass=1234 |oui=74:DA:38 |oui_eth=74:DA:38 }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''400''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''1300 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1300 Pro Outdoor PoE Access Point}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.edimax.com/edimax/merchandise/merchandise_detail/data/edimax/global/smb_access_points_ac1300/oap1300/}} "1246-01000209-50Z ES" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The chip ID is not 100% clear so it may be an IPQ4019 or similar. EW-7429HOB and GAP-429HOB are listed as identical in the FCC filing. *[https://ru.gecid.com/netlan/edimax_pro_oap1300/ ''Edimax Pro OAP1300'' Review on '''Gecid'''] (RU) ===See also=== *[[Edimax OAP1750]] - ''AC1750 Pro Outdoor PoE Access Point'' • [http://www.edimax.ua/edimax/merchandise/merchandise_detail/data/edimax/ua/smb_access_points_ac1750/oap1750/ PPage] (IP67) *[[Edimax Gemini RG21S]] - ''AC2600 MU-MIMO Wireles Router'' • [https://ru.gecid.com/netlan/edimax_rg21s_re23s_re11s/ Review] *[[Edimax Gemini RE23S]] - ''AC2600 Wireles Range Extender'' • [https://www.edimax.com/edimax/merchandise/merchandise_detail/data/edimax/global/whole_home_wifi_system_ac2600_dual-band/re23s/ PPage] *[[Edimax Gemini RE11S]] - ''AC1200 Wireles Range Extender'' • [http://www.edimax.com/edimax/merchandise/merchandise_detail/data/edimax/ua/wireless_ac1200/re11s/ PPage] :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7620A – @580MHz WiSoC :RAM: Winbond W9751G6KB-25 – 64MB (DDR2-800) :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7612EN – 802.11ac (2T2R) :ETH: [[Realtek]] RTL8211E – 1GbE Ethernet PHY __NOTOC__
